title: 4 Rare 80s Albums [Part 19] Post Punk Bands
description:
Today I had a little e-mail chat with a cool friend of mine who reminded me of one great post punk band, so this made me think of posting four post punk records as well. WARNING! post punk is not your regular 80's stuff. It's a bit hard to swallow. If you've just started listening to the 80's, probably it's not the right genre to start with! Thanks to Edward for the inspiration and Pauline Murray & The Invisible Girls record!



Get Smart! - Action Reaction [1984]

01 Because Of Green  
02 What It Is We Fear  
03 Knight  
04 Ankle Deep In Mud  
05 You've Got To Stop  
06 On And On  
07 Just For The Moment  
08 The Difference  
09 Face  
10 Black Mirror  
11 Berlin On The Plains  
12 They Walk In Pairs  


Members: Marc Koch (vocals, guitar, 1980-90), Lisa Wertman Crowe (bass, vocals, 1980-90), Frank Loose (drums, vocals, 1980-87), Jay Sebastian (drums, 1988), Ric Menck (drums, 1988-89), Bob Lara (guitar, 1988-90) 



Pauline Murray & The Invisible Girls [1980]

01 Screaming in the Darkness  
02 Dream Sequence 1  
03 European Eyes  
04 Shoot You Down  
05 Sympathy  
06 Time Slipping  
07 Drummer Boy  
08 Thundertunes  
09 When Will We Learn  
10 Mr. X  
11 Judgement Day 
12 The Visitor
13 Animal Crazy
14 Searching For Heaven

Members: Pauline Murray (vocals), Dave Rowbotham (guitar, 1980), Vini Reilly (guitar, 1980), Robert Blamire (bass), Steve Hopkins (keyboards), John Maher (drums), Martin Hannett (guitar, bass, 1980), Dave Hassell (percussion, 1980), Wayne Hussey (guitar, 1981)

Members: June Miles-Kingston (drums, vocals), Ramona Carlier (vocals), Kate Korus (guitar), Jane Crockford (bass), Melissa Ritter (guitar), Sue Slack (vocals)
